title: UI: fix Possible Tasks table column drift (remove horizontal scroll split)
close_reason: Implemented + deployed to voice-dev (tests/build/pm2 restart)

title: Implement event log + transcript segment edit v1
description: Implement plan/implementation-draft-v1.md + plan/edit-event-log-plan.md (phase 1-2): add session log collection + API endpoints for session_log/edit/delete/rollback/resend/retry, add oid helpers + object_locator, minimal UI Log tab, and Jest tests. Keep diarization plan as spec-only; adjust specs if needed.

title: Backend: session log + edit/delete/rollback endpoints
description: Implement phase-1 backend from plan/edit-event-log-plan.md: collections + oid parser + object_locator + CRM endpoints (session_log, edit/delete transcript segment, rollback, resend notify, retry categorization). Ensure reason validation and lowercase snake_case events.

title: S4-T02: Integration matrix expansion
description: Add end-to-end integration coverage for event-log actions and diarization flows.
acceptance_criteria: - matrix covers edit/delete/rollback/resend/retry + diarization\n- tests green

title: S4-T03: Dev smoke checklist
description: Create repeatable smoke checklist for voice-dev with expected outputs.
acceptance_criteria: - checklist runnable by operator\n- expected outputs documented

title: S4-T04: Release checklist dev->prod
description: Build explicit go/no-go gates and rollback criteria for release.
acceptance_criteria: - measurable gates\n- rollback path time-bounded

title: S4-T05: Post-release validation report
description: Define and execute post-release validation for logs/latency/error/fallback KPIs.
acceptance_criteria: - KPI report produced\n- no critical regressions

title: S1-T01: Contract snapshot freeze
description: Freeze current API/event payload contracts as baseline artifact.
acceptance_criteria: - all routes/fields mapped 1:1\n- legacy aliases listed

title: S1-T02: Event taxonomy audit
description: Audit emitted event names and domain grouping in runtime code.
acceptance_criteria: - only lowercase snake_case events\n- taxonomy map produced

title: S1-T03: Idempotency policy for replay actions
description: Define/enforce idempotency for rollback/resend/retry actions.
acceptance_criteria: - repeated actions safe\n- dedup behavior documented

title: S1-T04: Session-log index review
description: Review/add indexes for session-log read paths and verify explain plans.
acceptance_criteria: - index coverage documented\n- explain shows IXSCAN on target queries

title: S1-T05: API schema examples refresh
description: Refresh docs/examples to match current handlers and optional reason.
acceptance_criteria: - docs match live behavior\n- no stale required-reason artifacts

title: Frontend: Log tab + segment edit/delete UI
description: Implement phase-2 minimal UI from plan/implementation-draft-v1.md: Log tab for a session, render events, provide actions (rollback/resend/retry) and in-place segment edit/delete with reason.

title: Tests: event-log endpoints
description: Add Jest unit+integration tests for oid parsing, reason validation, session_log listing, edit/delete/rollback/resend/retry endpoints.

title: Migration: backfill segment_oids + object_locator
description: Phase 3 from plan/implementation-draft-v1.md: maintenance backfill for historical messages to ensure transcription.segments[].id (ch_*) and object_locator rows exist; add indexes; consistency checks.

title: S2-T01: Migration preflight + dry-run script
description: Implement dry-run scanner for historical messages to estimate migration impact (missing segment ids, missing canonical transcription, missing locators).
acceptance_criteria: - outputs counts by issue type\n- no writes in dry-run mode\n- report artifact saved

title: S2-T10: Production migration execution
description: Run migration in production maintenance window and produce final report.
acceptance_criteria: - migration completed successfully\n- post-check integrity pass green

title: S2-T02: Read-only maintenance toggle/runbook
description: Define and implement read-only guard procedure for migration maintenance window.
acceptance_criteria: - write endpoints blocked during window\n- rollback procedure documented

title: S2-T03: Canonical transcription backfill
description: Backfill canonical transcription object for legacy messages where canonical object is absent/incomplete.
acceptance_criteria: - every migrated message has canonical transcription\n- rerun is idempotent

title: S2-T04: Segment ID backfill ch_*
description: Assign stable ch_<hex24> ids for segments lacking ids.
acceptance_criteria: - every segment has stable ch_* id\n- no index-based addressing remains

title: S2-T05: Object locator backfill
description: Populate automation_object_locator for embedded transcript segments.
acceptance_criteria: - unique oid entries\n- parent refs and path are valid

title: S2-T06: Integrity verifier CLI
description: Create verifier for segment/locator consistency and dangling references.
acceptance_criteria: - zero dangling refs after migration\n- mismatch report generated

title: S2-T07: Batch strategy + resumable checkpoints
description: Implement checkpointed batch executor for resumable migration.
acceptance_criteria: - migration resumes after interruption\n- no duplicate writes on resume

title: S2-T08: Dev migration run and metrics
description: Execute full migration in dev and capture throughput/error metrics.
acceptance_criteria: - full dev run completed\n- throughput and error metrics recorded

title: S2-T09: Prod migration runbook finalization
description: Finalize production runbook with go/no-go and rollback triggers.
acceptance_criteria: - explicit owner/checkpoints/rollback\n- validation queries included

title: Diarization: gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize
description: Phase 4 from plan/gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize-plan.md: switch primary ASR to gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize (diarized_json) with whisper fallback; ensure transcription_raw -> transcription immutable chain and UI rendering from transcription.segments.

title: S3-T01: Config flags and defaults
description: Finalize diarization/fallback env flags and defaults in config and docs.
acceptance_criteria: - env flags wired\n- .env.example updated

title: S3-T10: Cost/latency guardrails
description: Define thresholds and operational response for diarization latency/cost spikes.
acceptance_criteria: - guardrail thresholds documented\n- response playbook linked

title: S3-T02: OpenAI diarized adapter
description: Implement adapter call path for gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize with diarized_json.
acceptance_criteria: - full provider payload stored as transcription_raw\n- error handling explicit

title: S3-T03: Model-agnostic normalizer
description: Map provider payload to canonical immutable transcription schema.
acceptance_criteria: - canonical schema stable\n- fallback-compatible mapping

title: S3-T04: Fallback orchestration whisper-1
description: Implement controlled fallback when diarized payload is absent/invalid/error.
acceptance_criteria: - fallback automatically triggered\n- fallback reason logged

title: S3-T05: Direct path integration
description: Integrate diarization adapter/normalizer into direct (small file) transcribe path.
acceptance_criteria: - transcription_raw -> transcription persisted\n- text mirrors canonical transcription.text

title: S3-T06: Segmented path integration
description: Integrate diarization into segmented transcribe path and preserve segment coherence.
acceptance_criteria: - segments stitched correctly\n- stable ch_* ids assigned

title: S3-T07: Categorization input alignment
description: Use speaker-aware canonical segments for categorization when available.
acceptance_criteria: - categorization consumes canonical segments\n- no in-place transcription mutation

title: S3-T08: Speaker display mapping policy
description: Implement deterministic UI speaker display mapping with fallback labels.
acceptance_criteria: - stable mapping across refreshes\n- raw speaker labels preserved

title: S3-T09: Diarization observability
description: Add logs/metrics for segment counts, speakers, and fallback rate.
acceptance_criteria: - structured logs present\n- no secrets in logs

title: Dev: restore voice-dev backend (8083) + run tests
description: Fix 502 on voice-dev by bringing voicebot-backend back on :8083 (nginx upstream), then run repo test suite and basic HTTP smoke.
acceptance_criteria: - voice-dev returns 200/302 (no 502)\n- voicebot-backend listens on :8083\n- npm test passes
close_reason: Started voicebot-backend on :8083 under PM2 (fixing voice-dev 502), ran npm test + npm run test:voicebot + app build-test; all green. Saved PM2 process list.

title: UI: edit/delete segment buttons in Transcription tab
description: Add inline Edit/Delete controls for transcription.segments (ch_*) on the Transcription tab, using existing /voicebot/edit_transcript_chunk and /voicebot/delete_transcript_chunk endpoints (reason required).
acceptance_criteria:
- Transcription tab renders segments when available
- Each segment has Edit/Delete actions
- Actions require reason and update UI after success
- npm test + app build-test pass
close_reason: Added inline Edit/Delete actions for transcription segments in Transcription tab (reason modal), added best-effort legacy segment-id backfill on session read; tests + builds green; pushed to origin/main.

title: UI: hover-only edit/delete + inline editing + optional reason + log tab last
description: Refine Transcription editing UX: show edit/delete icons only on hover, inline editing (no modal), delete is immediate (no confirmation), reason optional (UI+API), move Log tab to last.
acceptance_criteria:
- Edit/Delete icons appear only on hover
- Edit is inline (no modal); Save/Cancel visible in edit mode
- Delete is immediate
- Reason is optional (API does not require; UI does not block)
- Log tab is last
- npm test + app build-test pass
close_reason: Transcription UX: hover-only Edit/Delete, inline editing (no modal), immediate delete; reason optional across UI+API; Log tab moved to last; updated plan docs; tests green; pushed.

title: S4-T01: Unit test expansion for migration+diarization
description: Expand unit tests for normalizer, fallback logic, and optional reason semantics.
acceptance_criteria: - critical branches covered\n- tests green

title: Add backend fallback for session-page Rec when FAB runtime is unavailable
description: MeetingCard Rec currently activates session and then calls window.__voicebotControl('rec'). If FAB runtime is not mounted, UI only warns and does not start recording. Add explicit fallback path (or disabled-state contract) so Rec action is deterministic in all layouts.

title: UI: add Copy action overlay for transcription chunks
description: Add Copy button before Edit/Delete and show actions only on hover as overlay without reserving extra layout space.
close_reason: Completed: Copy/Edit/Delete hover overlay implemented

title: UI: make Possible Tasks table responsive and narrow right-side columns
close_reason: Implemented + deployed to voice-dev (tests/build/pm2 restart)

title: Update docs/spec for session_done contract (no client telegram_user_id)
description: Refresh session-management docs and API notes: client sends only session_id for session_done, backend resolves performer from JWT and authorizes by session/project permissions. Include ack semantics and failure codes.
close_reason: Updated session management spec with socket auth contract, backend-only performer resolution, and ack/error semantics.

title: Do not auto-open new session on close
description: Stop creating a new session when previous session closes. New session must be opened only on new Telegram voice record arrival; WebRTC flow keeps managing its own sessions.
close_reason: Completed: removed auto-open new session on close

title: UI: mobile-friendly Possible Tasks view (table -> stacked list on narrow screens)
close_reason: Implemented + deployed on voice-dev (tests/build/pm2 restart)

title: Apply session/project access checks to all mutating socket events
description: Harden websocket handlers beyond session_done: subscribe_on_session, post_process_session, create_tasks_from_chunks must validate authenticated performer rights (session/project + required permission) before action.
close_reason: Implemented access validation on mutating socket events: subscribe_on_session, post_process_session, create_tasks_from_chunks; added ack error responses.

title: UI: inline chunk time info under transcription text
description: Remove dedicated Time column on transcription tab and render absolute+relative time under each chunk (e.g. 14:10, 5:10 - 8:13).
close_reason: Completed: Time column removed and inline timeline added

title: UI: fix Priority column width + raise 'show more' threshold in Possible Tasks
close_reason: Merged into main, rebuilt app/dist, restarted voicebot-backend on voice-dev

title: UI: unify grouped project selector across header + tasks
description: The session header project Select is grouped by project_group, while the Possible Tasks table uses a different flat Select. Create a shared ProjectSelect (grouped, with a sane label for missing groups) and reuse it in both places so UI and option ordering stay consistent and changes propagate everywhere it's used.
acceptance_criteria: 1) Header and tasks table project dropdown show the same grouped hierarchy and no 'undefined' group label. 2) Changing project selection immediately updates the visible value in the control (controlled props) and uses the same rendering in both places. 3) Tests/build/restart pass.
close_reason: Shipped shared grouped ProjectSelect; reused in header + Possible Tasks table; removed undefined group label; narrowed Tag/actions widths.

title: Add socket session_done authz tests (owner/project/restricted/forbidden)
description: Cover session_done socket handler with automated tests: valid owner with UPDATE, access via public project, access via restricted allowed_users, and forbidden paths (no UPDATE, no access, invalid session_id). Assert queue enqueue and ack payload.
notes: Added unit coverage for session access matrix via services/session-socket-auth.js (owner/project/restricted/forbidden baseline). Remaining: direct socket-handler integration tests for ack + queue behavior.

title: Backfill duration for session 698dbe033e7c061197071496
description: Recalculate and persist session duration using stored file metadata/chunk timestamps for session 698dbe033e7c061197071496.

title: Session management and Screenshort support
description: Implement Telegram session control and screenshot flow: /start, /done, /session, attachment ingestion, API schema updates, Screenshort UI, and LLM context integration.
acceptance_criteria:
- Telegram session lifecycle commands and attachment routing work end-to-end
- Screenshot messages are persisted as part of session messages
- Screenshort tab is available in UI
- Screenshot context is available in AI flows without breaking transcript pipeline
close_reason: Session management + Screenshort implemented end-to-end; remaining work (if any) tracked separately

title: tg commands /start /done /session behavior
description: Implement Telegram command handlers: /start creates/activates a new session without closing existing, /done closes active session and clears binding, /session returns active session when no arg or sets provided session id/url as active after access check.
acceptance_criteria:
- /start opens/activates session and replies with link
- /done closes active session if exists
- /session with/without arg responds and validates ownership access
- existing voice/text flow remains unchanged
close_reason: Command handlers now reply with session link; /done closes only mapped active session and clears binding; /session validates ownership and sets active mapping

close_reason: Implementation completed (task voicebot-rl2.1 closed)

title: telegram attachment routing handle_attachment path
description: Add Telegram handling for photo/document/media groups into HANDLE_ATTACHMENT path, with active-session resolution chain (active -> today-open -> create+activate), non-image document rejection message, and idempotency by file_id/message_id.
acceptance_criteria: - Photo/document messages map to active or today-open session\n- unsupported docs return user-facing 'ÐÐµ Ð¿Ð¾Ð´Ð´ÐµÑ€Ð¶Ð¸Ð²Ð°ÐµÑ‚ÑÑ Ñ„Ð¾Ñ€Ð¼Ð°Ñ‚'\n- duplicate uploads for same file_id/message_id are deduplicated
close_reason: photo/document routed to HANDLE_ATTACHMENT with idempotency by telegram chat_id/message_id; non-image documents rejected; attachments use backend proxy URLs (no bot token leak)

title: message schema extensions and attachment normalization
description: Extend message persistence to support message_type attachments and normalize Telegram screenshot/document payload into resource-link-like and local metadata fields without breaking legacy voice/text records.
acceptance_criteria: - message_type supports screenshot/document while keeping defaults\n- attachments stored with kind/source/uri/name/mimeType/size/caption\n- screenshot captions are reflected in text/transcription_text
close_reason: Implemented message_type + attachments normalization and persisted caption/metadata without breaking legacy voice/text

title: API add_text/add_attachment and session attachments response
description: Extend CRM API: add_text accepts optional attachments with text in one request; add explicit add_attachment endpoint (or contract-consistent alternative); session endpoint returns session_attachments derived from messages while preserving session_messages compatibility.
acceptance_criteria: - add_text accepts text + attachments\n- add_attachment API can create screenshot/document message records\n- /voicebot/session returns session_attachments and keeps existing clients working
close_reason: Implemented add_text(attachments), add_attachment endpoint, and session_attachments in /voicebot/session; covered by unit+integration tests

title: UI Screenshort tab and attachment cards
description: Implement Screenshort tab in SessionPage after Possible Tasks and before Log, add attachment cards (preview, caption or fallback, timestamp) and enforce session access checks.
acceptance_criteria: - Screenshort tab order is fixed relative to Log\n- attachments render with sort by message_timestamp\n- preview failure shows file-name fallback
close_reason: Added Screenshort tab + attachment cards UI and wired sessionAttachments store

title: LLM context and processing safety for screenshots
description: Update session summarization/categorization context builders to include screenshot blocks (caption + uri) and avoid processing loops by treating screenshots as already transcribed messages in pipeline contracts.
acceptance_criteria: - screenshot content participates in AI context\n- categorization/summarization does not stall on screenshot-only chunks\n- existing transcript order remains stable
close_reason: Added buildMessageAiText and wired into categorization processor/job + create_tasks agent transcription builder; screenshot/document blocks include proxy URIs and do not stall pipeline

title: UI: Possible Tasks table should show on desktop
description: The 'Possible Tasks' tab gets stuck in the compact/card layout even on a wide/full-screen view. Compact layout should only be used for genuinely narrow content widths (mobile/split panes), while desktop should render the dense table.
acceptance_criteria: On desktop/full-screen, the tasks tab renders as a table; on narrow content widths it switches to the compact stacked layout without horizontal scroll.
close_reason: Fixed: SessionPage main column now flex-1 so tasks area can expand; compact breakpoint lowered so desktop shows table.

title: Recalculate duration for session 698dbe033e7c061197071496 on media host
description: Run node cli/diagnostics/recalc_session_duration.js 698dbe033e7c061197071496 --apply on host where uploads/audio/sessions/698dbe033e7c061197071496 files are present. Current environment reports unresolved:file_missing for all 18 messages.
close_reason: Recalculated session/message durations on production media host by probing webm packet metadata and updating message+session duration fields (5758.222 sec).

title: Fix zero duration and transcription chunk timing baseline
